HotelElement.Name: The Moorings On Cavill Surfers Paradise Apartments

Description.Text: Located in Surfers Paradise, The Moorings on Cavill is a perfect starting point from which to explore Gold Coast. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk, balcony/terrace, alarm clock to ensure a restful night. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, pool (kids). The Moorings on Cavill is an excellent choice from which to explore Gold Coast or to simply relax and rejuvenate.
